name: WormHoler(mobile)
description:
This was a 2 week project that was set up to be a test project of how well a game directed by dialogue and the main constraint was that the game could only be played with one main mechanic, so the team i was paired with and I decided to make a one button plat former where you don't move.

In case you fire through the tutorial, 

Left click is used to teleport on any platform you click on

Right click to slowdown time

red platforms are normal

yellow platforms teleport you to green platforms

green platforms explode after a couple of seconds

blue platforms move left to right

pink/purple platforms go up and down

Thank you for playing and i need all the feedback i can get for what elements of this project are good and which are bad.
